moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s Defense by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Dire Hit All +
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Sacred Sword
moves.effect: Ignores the target’s raised stats when attacking with this move.

moves.name: Justice for All!
moves.effect: Applies the Move Gauge Acceleration effect to the allied field of play. Raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

passives.name: Fighting Teamwork
passives.description: Powers up the moves of all allied sync pairs by 10%. Reduces attack move damage taken by all allied sync pairs by 10%. The more allied sync pairs with the Fighting theme you have on your team, the higher these percentages are. (Each additional sync pair powers up moves by 5% and reduces damage by 2%. The maximum power-up is 20%, and the maximum damage reduction is 14%.)

passives.name: Team Fast-Track 4
passives.description: Has a chance (50%) of raising the Speed of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.

passives.name: First Aid 4
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: On a Roll 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.

grid.bonus: Rock Smash:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Rock Smash:Ripple Effect 4- When a move used by the user’s Pokémon lowers an opponent’s stat, has a chance (50%) of lowering the same stat for all opposing sync pairs.
Dire Hit All +:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dire Hit All +:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Sacred Sword:Move Gauge Refresh 1- Has a chance (20%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Sacred Sword:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Justice for All!:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Justice for All!:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Justice for All!:Shielded 1- Raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user’s move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Stalwart- Sp. Def cannot be lowered.
Quick Cure- Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user the first time they are inflicted each battle.
Toughen Up 1- Has a chance (20%) of raising the user’s Defense by one stat rank when it is hit by an attack move.
Tighten Up 1- Has a chance (20%) of raising the user’s Sp. Def by one stat rank when it is hit by an attack move.
Healthy Healing- Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user when its HP is full when it enters a battle.
Synchro Healing 1- Restores the HP of all allied sync pairs by approximately 20% of their maximum HP after using the user’s sync move.
Sync Cure- Removes all status conditions from the user after using its sync move.
